  • Reference

Bed occupancy/availability in Scotland

scotland_beds.Rd

Beds by Board of Treatment and Specialty, 2016-2022.

Usage

scotland_beds

Format

A data frame with 11,060 rows and 6 variables:

hb19_code

Scottish Health Board code

date

Date, representing the start of the quarter

specialty

Name of the specialty

average_number_available_staffed_beds

Daily average number of available staffed beds

average_number_occupied_beds

Daily average number of occupied beds

percent_occupied_beds

Percentage (%) of daily occupancy of beds

...

Source

https://www.opendata.nhs.scot

On this page
